title: muraiyiTTup-panmurai
sahitya:
muraiyiTTup-panmurai uraittiDa en kuraiyai viraTTiDa unnaruLaip-peruvadeppO murugA


anupallavi

  tirai kaDarkkarai arugE uraiyum karuNAkaranE varaiyinri aruLai vArit-taruginra dayAparanE


caraNam    siraippaTTu aDimaiyAi sIr keTTu viTTa dEvar muraiyiTTa pOdavar kurai tIrtiTTa guhanE
viraivil avvAren kurai yAvum maraiyavE krpai purivadE undan perumaikk-uriyadAgum
